sentences.sContent: I knocked on the door but nobody answered.
sentences.sCn: 我敲了敲门，但没人应门。

sentences.sContent: A man in my position has nothing to fear from a nobody like you.
sentences.sCn: 在我这样职位的一个男人没什么好怕像你这样一个无名之辈的。

phrases.pCn: 没人能做到；那么别人也休想

words.tran: 头；大人物；[建] 球形门柄

trans.tranCn: 无人，没有人；没有任何人

trans.tranOther: If someone says that a person is a nobody, they are saying in an unkind way that the person is not at all important
